author: Kaelan Deese
title: China reclassifies dogs as pets instead of livestock
description: China's Ministry of Agriculture issued new guidelines Wednesday that reclassify dogs as pets instead of livestock, part of the country's response to the coronavirus pandemic."As far as dogs are concerned, along wit...
content:
China's Ministry of Agriculture issued new guidelines Wednesday that reclassify dogs as pets instead of livestock, part of the country's response to the coronavirus pandemic.
"As far as dogs are concerned, along with the progress of human civilization and th… [+982 chars]
